title: PSA: If you're Jungle, gank. -- If you're mid, roam.
body:
It hurts when I don't see a cheese level 2 gank from Lee Sin, Aatrox, Xin Zhao, Udyr or Vi.

Hurts even more when an Akali, Katarina, Veigar or LeBlanc don't roam.

replies.body: people down-voting this are probably the people he's referring to, play xin for example, smash the top half of your jungle, get lvl 2, get your q and e, roam top or mid, if your laner is decent, it's probably a kill.

> people down-voting this are probably the people he's referring to, play xin for example, smash the top half of your jungle, get lvl 2, get your q and e, roam top or mid, if your laner is decent, it's probably a kill.

People just downvote me because I trolled them, and they're mad.
